title: Nintendo Direct Coming End of June!? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.13.22
description:
Go to http://shopify.com/kfgames to get a free 14-day trial. 

Go to http://athleticgreens.com/kindafunny to get a free 1-year supply of Vitamin D and 5 free travels packs with your first purchase.

Blessing and Tim are BACK from LA! Let's talk about Xbox Games Showcase, a possible Nintendo Direct, and a whole lot more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:30 - Housekeeping
A whole lot is happening right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnygames including a new episode of Kinda Funny Xcast which is our Xbox & Bethesda Showcase wrap-up. A live reaction later to the Capcom showcase happening live on Twitch. And an episode of Gamescast we’re recording later wrapping up our time at Summer Game Fest Play Days playing Street Fighter 6, Sonic Frontiers, and more. You can catch all that and more this week on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.
The Kinda Funny Tik Tok has a TON of previews from Summer Game Fest including Street Fighter 6, Cuphead: The Delicious Last Course , and Wrestlequest! @kindafunnygames on Tik Tok!
You've had a weekend with #TheQuarry, so who made it out of Hackett's Quarry Summer Camp alive? Come find out how it went for us in our Quarry Spoilercast on the Gamescast YouTube and Podcast feeds!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire & Fargo Brady
The Roper Report   -
00:06:17 - Are we getting a Nintendo Direct at the end of June? - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:11:55 - Did Xbox make the right choice in only talking about the next year or do you think there should have been content shown depicting games post-June 2023? - Best Friends Q:luciddre4m
00:16:55 - A quick recap of the Xbox & Bethesda showcase highlights
00:24:30 - Your Starfield character won't have a voice - Ali Jones @ GamesRadar
00:26:30 - Did Xbox make the right choice in only talking about the next year or do you think there should have been content shown depicting games post-June 2023? - Best Friends Q:JakeBakesCakes
00:33:40 -  Ad
00:36:50 - Kojima Productions Makes Clear It Still Has 'Very Good Partnership' With PlayStation - Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:43:40 - Persona is also coming to PlayStation and Steam - Ed Nightingale @ Eurogamer
The Nano Biologist
00:46:30 - Sonic Frontiers won’t be delayed as a result of fan feedback, insists Sonic Team’s boss - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:50:46 - Raekwon and Ghostface made a song for TMNT Shredder’s Revenge and it’s absolute fire - Twitter
00:54:49 - Out today
00:56:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing & Whitta
